mainText:
I will sincerely miss Steve.  I've been an Apple fan boy since i got
my iPod touch 2 years ago and it has been my dream since to meet Mr  Jobs.

My friends and I will miss him very much.  He has changed this world with
Apple and I know my life has been changed by the remarkable products Apple
has produced.  R.I.P. Steve, Greatly Missed, Forever Remembered.
author: Clayton
